cover_subtitle: Together for Ukraine · Amazon Web Services Strategic Partnership
intro_text: The Educational Equality Institute (TEEI) is proud to partner with Amazon Web Services to empower Ukrainian refugees across Europe with in-demand cloud computing skills. Through this strategic collaboration, TEEI and AWS will provide technical training and certification pathways, enabling displaced Ukrainian talent to reskill for the cloud-native workforce. Together, we aim to drive positive social impact at scale, accelerating employability and digital transformation in the communities we serve.

programs.name: Cloud Fundamentals
programs.description: Introduction to cloud computing with focus on employment outcomes.

programs.name: Advanced Skills Development
programs.description: Specialized technical training for career advancement.

cta_text: Ready to expand our Amazon Web Services partnership and transform education through technology and create lasting impact?
_autopilot_notes: Highlight concrete employability outcomes (78% employment rate, €45k avg salary)
Emphasize Europe/Ukraine narrative - refugees building new careers
Include AWS Academy partnership expansion details

_autopilot_objectives: Scale cloud skills training for displaced Ukrainian learners across Europe
Increase AWS certification completion rates and employment outcomes
Establish strategic multi-year partnership framework with measurable impact
